title: I need to be level 7 to post comments?
body:
When I try to post comments, it says that I need to be level 7. The thing is that I am level 30...


Kinda new to the boards things, so thanks in advance.

replies.body: Welcome to the boards!  It can take a bit for your account to sync to your profile when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here helped get things up today, so everything should be okay now!
